sentences: Bhavana Radhakrishnan (born 28 July 1961) is a Carnatic singer and playback singer in Malayalam cinema.
She received the 1997  Kerala State Film Award for Best Singer for the song "Ennodenthini pinakkam" in the film Kaliyattam.
She is a music educator and currently working as associate professor  in Carnatic music at SN College, Kollam.
